x-codeSamples.source:
import requests
import json

url = "https://dev-api.omnilogistics.com/v1/create/shipment"

payload = json.dumps({
  "oShipData": {
    "Ready Date": "2021-05-31T06:47:00",
    "Service Level": "PL",
    "Close Time": "2021-05-31T17:00:00",
    "Close Date": "2021-05-31T17:00:00",
    "Shipper Name": "LLYN STRONG",
    "Shipper Address 1": "119 NORTH MAIN STREET",
    "Shipper Address 2": "417 Oakbend Blvd.",
    "Shipper City": "GREENVILLE",
    "Shipper State": "SC",
    "Shipper Zip": 29601,
    "Shipper Country": "US",
    "Shipper Phone": 8642335900,
    "Shipper Contact": "KATE",
    "Shipper Email": "ash@yahoo.com",
    "Consignee Name": "SOLIDSCAPE, INC.",
    "Consignee Address 1": "316 DANIEL WEBSTER HIGHWAY",
    "Consignee Address 2": "apt 345",
    "Consignee City": "MERRIMACK",
    "Consignee State": "NH",
    "Consignee Zip": 3054,
    "Consignee Country": "US",
    "Consignee Phone": "603 429-9700",
    "Consignee Contact": "Marilyn King",
    "Consignee Email": "mking@solidscape.com",
    "Special Instructions": "INSIDE PICKUP LIFTGATE REQURIED",
    "Shipment Line List": [
      {
        "Description": "TestTestTestTest Test Test 12345678iubvsdbvojbvjbsovbsovosv",
        "Weight": "5",
        "Height": "4.0",
        "Length": "2.0",
        "Width": "3.0",
        "Pieces": "4",
        "WeightUOMV3": "lb",
        "DimUOMV3": "in",
        "PieceType": "CYL",
        "Hazmat": "1"
      },
      {
        "Description": "TestTestTestTest Test Test TestTest",
        "Weight": "20",
        "Height": "5",
        "Length": "30",
        "Width": "10",
        "Pieces": "20",
        "WeightUOMV3": "lb",
        "DimUOMV3": "cm",
        "PieceType": "SKD",
        "Hazmat": "0"
      },
      {
        "Description": "TestTest 4578 TestTestboubsovbosvbobdjobvoavbovebv",
        "Weight": "20",
        "Height": "5",
        "Length": "30",
        "Width": "10",
        "Pieces": "20",
        "WeightUOMV3": "lb",
        "DimUOMV3": "cm",
        "PieceType": "SKD",
        "Hazmat": "0"
      }
    ],
    "Reference List": [
      {
        "Reference No": "RMA 32768"
      }
    ],
    "New Shipment Accessorials List": [
      {
        "Code": "PALL"
      },
      {
        "Code": "SHRNK"
      },
      {
        "Code": "WEEK"
      },
      {
        "Code": "HOLPU"
      },
      {
        "Code": "LIMPU"
      }
    ]
  }
})
headers = {
  'x-api-key': '<X-API-KEY>',
  'Content-Type': 'application/json'
}

response = requests.request("POST", url, headers=headers, data=payload)

print(response.text)

curl --location --request POST 'https://dev-api.omnilogistics.com/v1/create/shipment' \
--header 'x-api-key: <X-API-KEY>' \
--header 'Content-Type: application/json' \
--data-raw '{
   "oShipData":{
        "Ready Date": "2021-05-31T06:47:00",
        "Service Level": "PL",
        "Close Time": "2021-05-31T17:00:00",
        "Close Date": "2021-05-31T17:00:00",
        "Shipper Name": "LLYN STRONG",
        "Shipper Address 1": "119 NORTH MAIN STREET",
        "Shipper Address 2": "417 Oakbend Blvd.",
        "Shipper City": "GREENVILLE",
        "Shipper State": "SC",
        "Shipper Zip": 29601,
        "Shipper Country": "US",
        "Shipper Phone": 8642335900,
        "Shipper Contact": "KATE",

        "Consignee Name": "SOLIDSCAPE, INC.",
        "Consignee Address 1": "316 DANIEL WEBSTER HIGHWAY",
        "Consignee Address 2": "apt 345",
        "Consignee City": "MERRIMACK",
        "Consignee State": "NH",
        "Consignee Zip": 3054,
        "Consignee Country": "US",
        "Consignee Phone": "603 429-9700",
        "Consignee Contact": "Marilyn King",
        "Consignee Email": "mking@solidscape.com",
        "Special Instructions": "INSIDE PICKUP LIFTGATE REQURIED",
      "Shipment Line List":[
         {
            "Description":"TestTestTestTest Test Test 12345678iubvsdbvojbvjbsovbsovosv",
            "Weight":"5",
            "Height":"4.0",
            "Length":"2.0",
            "Width":"3.0",
            "Pieces":"4",
            "WeightUOMV3":"lb",
            "DimUOMV3":"in",
            "PieceType":"CYL",
            "Hazmat":"1"
         },
         {
            "Description":"TestTestTestTest Test Test TestTest",
            "Weight":"20",
            "Height":"5",
            "Length":"30",
            "Width":"10",
            "Pieces":"20",
            "WeightUOMV3":"lb",
            "DimUOMV3":"cm",
            "PieceType":"SKD",
            "Hazmat":"0"
         },
         {
            "Description":"TestTest 4578 TestTestboubsovbosvbobdjobvoavbovebv",
            "Weight":"20",
            "Height":"5",
            "Length":"30",
            "Width":"10",
            "Pieces":"20",
            "WeightUOMV3":"lb",
            "DimUOMV3":"cm",
            "PieceType":"SKD",
            "Hazmat":"0"
         }
      ],
      "Reference List":[
         {
            "Reference No":"RMA 32768"
         }
      ],
      "New Shipment Accessorials List":[
         {
            "Code":"PALL"
         },
         {
            "Code":"SHRNK"
         },
         {
            "Code":"WEEK"
         },
         {
            "Code":"HOLPU"
         },
         {
            "Code":"LIMPU"
         }
      ]
   }
}'

curl --location --request GET 'https://dev-api.omnilogistics.com/v1/shipment/detail?house_bill_nbr=7010249' \
--header 'x-api-key: <X-API-KEY>'

curl --location --request GET 'https://dev-api.omnilogistics.com/v1/shipment/info?house_bill_nbr=7010249' \
--header 'x-api-key: <X-API-KEY>'

curl --location --request GET 'https://dev-api.omnilogistics.com/v1/invoice/detail?house_bill_nbr=5865228' \
--header 'x-api-key: <X-API-KEY>'

import requests

url = "https://dev-api.omnilogistics.com/v1/billoflading?house_bill_nbr=5865232"

payload="<file contents here>"
headers = {
  'x-api-key': '<X-API-KEY>',
  'Content-Type': 'text/plain'
}

response = requests.request("GET", url, headers=headers, data=payload)

print(response.text)

curl --location --request GET 'https://dev-api.omnilogistics.com/v1/billoflading?house_bill_nbr=5865232' \
--header 'x-api-key: <X-API-KEY>' \
--header 'Content-Type: text/plain' \
--data-binary '@'

curl --location 'https://dev-api.omnilogistics.com/v1.0/wms/orderstatus?DateFrom=2023-02-16T09%3A00%3A00&DateTo=2023-02-16T19%3A00%3A01' \
--header 'x-api-key: <X-API-KEY>'

import requests
import json

url = "https://dev-api.omnilogistics.com/v1.0/wms/order"

payload = json.dumps({
  "ShipTo": {
    "Name": "Johnson Orthodontics",
    "Street": "18947 John J Williams Hwy Unit 310",
    "Street2": "",
    "Street3": "",
    "City": "Rehoboth Beach",
    "State": "DE",
    "Phone": "3026455554",
    "Attention": "Dr. Jonathan Johnson",
    "Zipcode": "19971",
    "CountryCode": "US"
  },
  "BillTo": {
    "Name": "Johnson Orthodontics",
    "Street": "18947 John J Williams Hwy Unit 310",
    "Street2": "",
    "Street3": "",
    "City": "Rehoboth Beach",
    "State": "DE",
    "Phone": "3026455554",
    "Attention": "Dr. Jonathan Johnson",
    "Zipcode": "19971",
    "CountryCode": "US"
  },
  "LineItem": [
    {
      "StockCode": "FGI",
      "PartNumber": "RS-F2-DRGR-02",
      "Line": "1",
      "Quantity": "3",
      "Price": "149.00",
      "Description": ""
    }
  ],
  "CustomerReference": "IF474579A",
  "PONumber": "",
  "FreightTerms": "DAP",
  "Forwarder": "UPS",
  "ShipDate": "2022-08-23",
  "Currency": "USD",
  "ShippingNotes": "",
  "ShippingMethod": "Ground",
  "LocationId": "PHL",
  "ForwarderAccount": "",
  "SONumber": "US-007203173"
})
headers = {
  'Content-Type': 'application/json',
  'x-api-key': '<X-API-KEY>'
}

response = requests.request("POST", url, headers=headers, data=payload)

print(response.text)

curl --location 'https://dev-api.omnilogistics.com/v1.0/wms/order' \
--header 'Content-Type: application/json' \
--header 'x-api-key: <X-API-KEY>' \
--data '{
  "ShipTo": {
    "Name": "Johnson Orthodontics",
    "Street": "18947 John J Williams Hwy Unit 310",
    "Street2": "",
    "Street3": "",
    "City": "Rehoboth Beach",
    "State": "DE",
    "Phone": "3026455554",
    "Attention": "Dr. Jonathan Johnson",
    "Zipcode": "19971",
    "CountryCode": "US"
  },
  "BillTo": {
    "Name": "Johnson Orthodontics",
    "Street": "18947 John J Williams Hwy Unit 310",
    "Street2": "",
    "Street3": "",
    "City": "Rehoboth Beach",
    "State": "DE",
    "Phone": "3026455554",
    "Attention": "Dr. Jonathan Johnson",
    "Zipcode": "19971",
    "CountryCode": "US"
  },
  "LineItem": [
    {
      "StockCode": "FGI",
      "PartNumber": "RS-F2-DRGR-02",
      "Line": "1",
      "Quantity": "3",
      "Price": "149.00",
      "Description": ""
    }
  ],
  "CustomerReference": "IF474579A",
  "PONumber": "",
  "FreightTerms": "DAP",
  "Forwarder": "UPS",
  "ShipDate": "2022-08-23",
  "Currency": "USD",
  "ShippingNotes": "",
  "ShippingMethod": "Ground",
  "LocationId": "PHL",
  "ForwarderAccount": "",
  "SONumber": "US-007203173"
}

var myHeaders = new Headers();
myHeaders.append("Content-Type", "application/json");
myHeaders.append("x-api-key", "<X-API-KEY>");

var raw = JSON.stringify({
  "ShipTo": {
    "Name": "Johnson Orthodontics",
    "Street": "18947 John J Williams Hwy Unit 310",
    "Street2": "",
    "Street3": "",
    "City": "Rehoboth Beach",
    "State": "DE",
    "Phone": "3026455554",
    "Attention": "Dr. Jonathan Johnson",
    "Zipcode": "19971",
    "CountryCode": "US"
  },
  "BillTo": {
    "Name": "Johnson Orthodontics",
    "Street": "18947 John J Williams Hwy Unit 310",
    "Street2": "",
    "Street3": "",
    "City": "Rehoboth Beach",
    "State": "DE",
    "Phone": "3026455554",
    "Attention": "Dr. Jonathan Johnson",
    "Zipcode": "19971",
    "CountryCode": "US"
  },
  "LineItem": [
    {
      "StockCode": "FGI",
      "PartNumber": "RS-F2-DRGR-02",
      "Line": "1",
      "Quantity": "3",
      "Price": "149.00",
      "Description": ""
    }
  ],
  "CustomerReference": "IF474579A",
  "PONumber": "",
  "FreightTerms": "DAP",
  "Forwarder": "UPS",
  "ShipDate": "2022-08-23",
  "Currency": "USD",
  "ShippingNotes": "",
  "ShippingMethod": "Ground",
  "LocationId": "PHL",
  "ForwarderAccount": "",
  "SONumber": "US-007203173"
});

var requestOptions = {
  method: 'POST',
  headers: myHeaders,
  body: raw,
  redirect: 'follow'
};

fetch("https://dev-api.omnilogistics.com/v1.0/wms/order", requestOptions)
  .then(response => response.text())
  .then(result => console.log(result))
  .catch(error => console.log('error', error));

curl --location 'https://dev-api.omnilogistics.com/v1/proofofdelivery?house_bill_nbr=5869785' \
--header 'x-api-key: <X-API-KEY>'

curl --location 'https://dev-api.omnilogistics.com/v1/shipment/list/{customerID}' \
--header 'x-api-key: <X-API-KEY>'

curl --location 'https://dev-api.omnilogistics.com/eventing/v1/events' \
--header 'x-api-key: <X-API-KEY>'

import requests
import json

url = "https://dev-api.omnilogistics.com/eventing/v1/webhook"

payload = json.dumps({
  "EventType": "ShipmentAndMilestone",
  "Endpoint": "https://carrier-webhook.narvar.com/v1/events/tracking-data/omni-dell",
  "SharedSecret": "1234",
  "Preference": "fullPayload"
})
headers = {
  'Content-Type': 'application/json',
  'x-api-key': '<X-API-KEY>'
}

response = requests.request("POST", url, headers=headers, data=payload)

print(response.text)

curl --location 'https://dev-api.omnilogistics.com/eventing/v1/webhook' \
--header 'Content-Type: application/json' \
--header 'x-api-key: <X-API-KEY>' \
--data '{
  "EventType": "ShipmentAndMilestone",
  "Endpoint": "https://carrier-webhook.narvar.com/v1/events/tracking-data/omni-dell",
  "SharedSecret": "1234",
  "Preference": "fullPayload"
}

curl --location 'https://dev-api.omnilogistics.com/eventing/v1/webhook' \
--header 'Content-Type: application/json' \
--header 'x-api-key: <X-API-KEY>' \
--data '{
  "EventType": "ShipmentAndMilestone",
  "Endpoint": "https endpoint",
}

import requests
import json

url = "https://dev-api.omnilogistics.com/v1/shipment/ltlrate"

payload = json.dumps({
  "ltlRateRequest": {
    "reference": "12345678-9abc-def0-1234-56789abcdef1",
    "pickupTime": "2023-11-23T17:00:00",
    "shipperZip": "77040",
    "consigneeZip": "33467",
    "shipmentLines": [
      {
        "pieces": 1,
        "pieceType": "PCE",
        "weight": 615,
        "weightUOM": "lb",
        "length": 40,
        "width": 48,
        "height": 55,
        "dimUOM": "in",
        "hazmat": False,
        "freightClass": 50
      }
    ],
    "accessorialList": [
      "APPT",
      "INDEL"
    ]
  }
})
headers = {
  'Content-Type': 'application/json',
  'x-api-key': '<X-API-KEY>'
}

response = requests.request("POST", url, headers=headers, data=payload)

print(response.text)

curl --location 'https://dev-api.omnilogistics.com/v1/shipment/ltlrate' \
--header 'Content-Type: application/json' \
--header 'x-api-key: <X-API-KEY>' \
--data '{
    "ltlRateRequest": {
        "reference": "12345678-9abc-def0-1234-56789abcdef1",
        "pickupTime": "2023-11-23T17:00:00",
        "shipperZip": "77040",
        "consigneeZip": "33467",
        "shipmentLines": [
            {
                "pieces": 1,
                "pieceType": "PCE",
                "weight": 615,
                "weightUOM": "lb",
                "length": 40,
                "width": 48,
                "height": 55,
                "dimUOM": "in",
                "hazmat": false,
                "freightClass": 50
            }
        ],
        "accessorialList": [
            "APPT",
            "INDEL"
        ]
    }
}'

ApiKeyAuth.description: For this sample, you can use the api key `x-api-key` to test the authorization filters.
ApiKeyAuth.name: x-api-key
